experience.description: Lead development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users daily. Built and maintained React applications with TypeScript, implemented CI/CD pipelines, and mentored junior developers.
achievements: Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization
Led migration from monolith to microservices architecture
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews

experience.description: Developed MVP for fintech startup from ground up. Built responsive web applications and RESTful APIs, integrated third-party payment systems, and implemented real-time data synchronization.
achievements: Built MVP that secured $2M in Series A funding
Implemented real-time trading dashboard with WebSocket
Reduced API response time by 60% through optimization

experience.description: Created responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI/UX designs and optimized websites for SEO and performance.
achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and within budget
Improved client website loading speed by average 50%
